issue.title: Road texture does not show in camera sensor data

content.raw: The roads are created by a plugin with custom material. I figured out that this issue ONLY occurs when the camera is inserted from the "insert" tab bar when gazebo is already running. When the camera is loaded from a world-file at startup, everything is shown normal.
content.html: The roads are created by a plugin with custom material. I figured out that this issue ONLY occurs when the camera is inserted from the "insert" tab bar when gazebo is already running. When the camera is loaded from a world-file at startup, everything is shown normal.
